item.description:
It is a special time of year where spirits come back to the realm of the living and have some fun. For one day only, ghosts roam around free and the one thing they want to do is have some fun. Everyone is invited to play some ghostly games such as every ghost’s favorite game Tombstone Tag. You will have a blast playing but make sure the last laugh isn’t on you!

Pre Reg: $15/members and friends $25/nonmembers
At Door: $25/members and friends $35/nonmembers

Waiver Required for all non-members
Contact Us to Pre-Register
item.name: Buddy Night: Ghost Games
